mapper.sql: select manufacturers_id, manufacturers_name, manufacturers_image, date_added, last_modified from toc_manufacturers
mapper.insert: insert into toc_manufacturers (manufacturers_name, manufacturers_image, date_added, last_modified) values (#{name}, #{image}, #{dateAdded}, #{dateUpdated})

insert into toc_manufacturers_info (manufacturers_id, languages_id, manufacturers_url, manufacturers_friendly_url, manufacturers_page_title, manufacturers_meta_keywords, manufacturers_meta_description) values (#{id}, #{languageId}, #{url}, #{friendlyUrl}, #{pageTitle}, #{metaKeywords}, #{metaDescription})
